basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Pablo Seijo, a Computer Engineering student at the University of Santiago de Compostela and currently working as a Systems and Network Administrator at NS Centro de Psicoterapia y Trauma. Originally from Ferrol, Galicia, I actively participate in team-based projects such as Evolutia.dev (automation) and Meditracker (medication tracking). My main interests are in developing my own projects, automation using artificial intelligence, and network management. I primarily work with macOS and Ubuntu Server environments. I'm open to collaborating on initiatives that align with my technical interests.

projects.title: MediTracker
projects.description: Meditracker is a medication tracking app with a frontend-backend architecture. It allows users to log and monitor medication intakeâ€”sporadic or recurringâ€”via QR scanning or text search. The app includes a virtual assistant with voice interaction for improved accessibility, and features for healthcare professionals to manage and monitor patients. Designed for ease of use across all user profiles.
